tutorials.content:
Profile Picture

Clicking a profile picture will take you to that users profile page. Once you are on a persons profile page
  • Friend this person.
  • View their stats.
  • View their workouts.

Score or Time

This can include a time/pace for cardio workouts, or may be a max weight, score, or time for other workout types.

Don't forget to leave comments and help to motivate your friends

Actions

  • Stats link
    Click here to be taken to a graph containing stats about the workout.

  • Twitter
    Use this link to tweet this post via twitter.

  • Comment
    Click here to add a comment to someones post. You can comment on anyones post.

Comments



This section will contain comments and motivation from the friend you make on FlexFWD.
